# Environment
## Dev:

```
    ssh dgv012efa
    
    su - esd02ed
    password: #Today@321!

    cd /appl/esed/kafka/admin

```

## QA:

```
    ssh qgv012efb

    su - esq03ed
    password: #Today@321!

    cd /appl/esed/kafka

```

# Global Commands
Global commands do not set argument "b".

## Topics

### Find all topics names:
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a topics
java -jar kafkaya.jar -Q

```
### Find topics names with prefix specified by -q:
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a topics -q ESED_
java -jar kafkaya.jar -Q -q ESED_
java -jar kafkaya.jar -q ESED_

```

## Produce and Consume Message:
Message and Headers need to do base64 encoding

### Produce Message
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a produce -p TOPIC_NAME -m 
java -jar kafkaya.jar -p TOPIC_NAME -m 

```

### Produce Message with Headers
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a produce -p TOPIC_NAME -H ewogICJOYW1lIjogIkJvYiIsCiAgIk9jY3VwYXRpb24iOiAiQnVpbGRlciIKfQ== -m 
java -jar kafkaya.jar -p TOPIC_NAME -H ewogICJOYW1lIjogIkJvYiIsCiAgIk9jY3VwYXRpb24iOiAiQnVpbGRlciIKfQ== -m 

```

### Consume Latest Message
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a latest -c TOPIC_NAME
java -jar kafkaya.jar -c TOPIC_NAME

```

### List Latest Messages
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a latest -c TOPIC_NAME -n 25
java -jar kafkaya.jar -c TOPIC_NAME -n 25

```

### Publish and Subscribe
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a produce -c TOPIC_NAME -p TOPIC_NAME -H ewogICJOYW1lIjogIkJvYiIsCiAgIk9jY3VwYXRpb24iOiAiQnVpbGRlciIKfQ== -m 
java -jar kafkaya.jar -c TOPIC_NAME -p TOPIC_NAME -H ewogICJOYW1lIjogIkJvYiIsCiAgIk9jY3VwYXRpb24iOiAiQnVpbGRlciIKfQ== -m 

```

### Run Kafka Application
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -a application -f kafka-application-java.jar -s com.albertsons.edis.kafka.application.KafkaAppMain

```
# Business Object Related Commands

All business object related commands need to set argument "b" to specify a workspace of the business object.

## Create, Update and Delete Workspace

### Create Workspace for Business Object
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO -a create -c CONSUME_TOPIC_NAME -p PRODUCE_TOPIC_NAME -m 

```

### Update Workspace for Business Object
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO -a update -c CONSUME_TOPIC_NAME -p PRODUCE_TOPIC_NAME -m 

```

### Delete a Business Object Workspace
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO -a delete

```

### Create File to Hold Test Message
Arguments
- b: Business Object, required
- a: Action, set to "FILE", required
- f: File to hold message, required; If file exists, update the contents, otherwise, create a new file.
- m: Message contents, base64 encoded, required; if Message contents set to "X"

Create or update:
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO -a FILE -f TEST.json -m  

```

Delete the file:
```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO -a FILE -f TEST.json -m X

```

## Kafka Related Commands Under Business Object Context
Precondition:
- The workspace of Business Object has been created.

Arguments:
- b: Business Object, required
- a: Action, optional default produce and consume using preset "p", "c" and "m" arguments;
- f: File to hold message, optional; If specified, publish the message in the file to produce topic;
- c: Consumer topic name, optional; If not specified, using preset value as default;
- p: Produce topic name, optional; If not specified, using preset value as default;
- m: Message contents, base64 encoded, optional; if provided, publish this message to produce topic;
- H: Headers set to kafka producer message, as json object and base64 encoded, optional;
- x: Remove early log while printing the test log;

```
java -jar kafkaya.jar -b BO

```

# Arguments:

| Option       | LongOpt            | Has argument | Required     | Description  |
| ------------ | ------------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ |
| a            | action             | True         | False        | Task to execute. |
| b            | businessObject     | True         | False        | Business object. |
| c            | consumerTopic      | True         | False        | Consumer Topic. |
| f            | file               | True         | False        | File related to the action specified. |
| H            | header             | True         | False        | Kafka message header. |
| m            | msg                | True         | False        | Message for Kafka producer, base64 encode required. |
| n            | count              | True         | False        | Number of message to print out. |
| p            | producerTopic      | True         | False        | Producer Topic. |
| Q            | Query              | False        | False        | Find All Topics. |
| q            | query              | True         | False        | Query logic based on action specified. |
| s            | className          | True         | False        | Task class to execute.  |
| t            | taskMethod         | True         | False        | Method name of task class to execute.  |
| x            | clean              | True         | False        | Do cleanup based on action specified.  |
